email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

I hope this message finds you well. We have a spot inquiry for 150,000MT of Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam under CIF terms. The vessel proposed is MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 210,000, LOA 330m. Our starting freight quote is USD 28.50 per metric ton. Laycan is proposed for November 10-15.

Please let us know if this works for you or if you need further details.

Best regards,
Alex Turner

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the prompt response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high compared to current market levels. Could you review the rate to USD 26.50 per MT? Additionally, could you confirm the demurrage terms?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for your feedback. After reviewing the market, I can offer a revised rate of USD 27.00 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 18,000 per day, pro-rata. The vessel is in excellent condition and has a proven track record for this route.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the revised quote. We can agree to USD 27.00 per MT, provided the laycan remains firm at November 10-15. Could you also confirm the vessel's ETA at Tubarao and any additional port charges?

Best,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Dear Sarah,

The laycan is confirmed for November 10-15. MV OCEAN HORIZON is expected to arrive at Tubarao on November 9, subject to weather conditions. Port charges are included in the freight rate. Demurrage terms remain as previously stated.

If everything is in order, I will prepare the recap for your review.

Best regards,
Alex

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore from Tubarao to Rotterdam
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the recap. We will finalize the documentation on our end.

Thank you for your assistance.

Best,
Sarah
